entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
